option.name: PROGRAM_PARAMETERS
option.value: -n 2 -q "SELECT * FROM pattern [every (eventB = BaseEvent(eventType='B') -> (eventC= BaseEvent(eventType='C') AND eventE=BaseEvent(eventType='E') AND eventD=BaseEvent(eventType='D') AND eventF=BaseEvent(eventType='F')))] WHERE (eventB.nodeId IN (5, 9) AND eventC.nodeId IN (5,9) AND eventE.nodeId IN (5, 9) AND eventD.nodeId IN (5,9) AND eventF.nodeId IN (5,9))" -u localhost
